alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:51PM CDT until September 21 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Chase County in east central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Dunlap, or 8 miles northeast of Strong City, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Saffordville, and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
